name: Aadhaar Card Application

steps.title: Welcome to Aadhaar Application
steps.content: This process will help you apply for a new Aadhaar card. You will need to provide personal information and scan supporting documents.
steps.prompt: Welcome to Aadhaar card application. I will guide you through the process step by step.

steps.title: Full Name
steps.prompt: What is your full name as it should appear on the Aadhaar card?

steps.title: Gender
steps.prompt: What is your gender? Say male, female, or other.

steps.title: Address Proof
steps.prompt: Please scan your address proof document such as electricity bill, bank statement, or rental agreement.

steps.title: Mobile Number
steps.prompt: What is your mobile number for SMS updates?

steps.title: Confirm Details
steps.prompt: Please review all the information you have provided. Say yes to confirm or no to make changes.

steps.title: Submit Application
steps.prompt: Submitting your Aadhaar card application. Please wait...

requiredDocuments: Address proof (Electricity bill, Bank statement, Rental agreement)
Date of birth proof (Birth certificate, School certificate)
trackingInfo: You will receive SMS updates on your registered mobile number
